pullRequest.title: Chore/client tests codestyle docs
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR is a collaborative effort to improve client tests, code style and documentation
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.

Motivation and Context
We have outdated tests, JSDoc comments in the client files are missing in several places and the code style of the tests is not always in a good shape.
This PR is an ongoing effort to collaboratively improve the client files and fix the mentioned issues:

 Client code style
 Fix all tests (or remove outdated ones)

It would be great if everyone can help to fix all issues in the next 2 weeks!

commit.message: Move some activated route mocks from /helpers/ to /mocks/
Move mocks of services in own sub-directory
Move all test suites from spec/app to spec/component or spec/service
Group all non-spec files (mocks, utils, samples) in /helpers/ directory for the sake of clarity
Remove unnecessary describe('Component Tests'... from all test suites
Remove unnecessary describe('Service Tests'... from all test suites
MockRouter is not a service mock
Remove one of the duplicated MockActivatedRoute implementations

delete outdated test cases: modeling-submission.service.spec.ts,
modeling-exercise.service.spec.ts
fix participation.service.spec.ts find() test and delete redundant create() test
Merge branch 'chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs
Merge branch 'chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs
fix participation list for exercise test case in participation.service.spec.ts
Fix 4/5 of the tests in file-upload-exercise.service.spec.ts
Merge branch 'chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs
Merge branch 'chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs
Use newer rxjs pipe syntax in file-upload-submission.service.ts

update client configs

1) run all client tests
2) check documentation automatically
3) also check files in test folder for code style
also apply prettier on js files and format them except k6 files to avoid merge conflicts with the open PR
Merge branch 'chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs
Fix even more code style issues
Fix failing test: default value for page in audits component should be 1 instead of 10
Fix failing test: remove test case as filterNaN function no longer exists in metrics component
Fix failing test: adjust resource url to real value in metrics service
Fix failing test: remove two expect statements as servicesStats and cachesStats attributes no longer exist
fix "sets focus after the view has been initialized" test case
Fix password reset init component test
Fix failing test: Remove "Should call load all on init" as loadAll is not dependent on service's query method

nodes.bodyText: I removed this test case as the loadAll() method in user-management.component.ts is not any longer directly dependent on the query() method in user.service.ts. In this commit ngx-store was introduced: cc24454#diff-4af81ae5b1dc6f8eb6c64db0483e7951R137

commit.message: Fix failing test: add missing fields to compared user object in user management detail component test
supress eslint warning for mock methods
Chai friendly eslint rules + clean up code-editor-status.spec.ts
moved variables to avoid shadowed varialves
Fix batch of code style issues

Revert "fix code style issues"

This reverts commit 263dd133
turn off "no-unused-vars" warning for mock TypeScript files
Merge branch 'chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs
Fix batch of code style issues
Fix code style in quiz related files

fix ts-lint errors in metrics-modal.component.spec.ts, course.service.spec.ts, file-upload-exercise.service.spec.ts, file-upload-submission.service.spec.ts, modeling-exercise.service.spec.ts, modeling-submission.service.spec.ts, participation.service.spec.ts, programming-exercise.service.spec.ts, programming-submission.service.spec.ts, quiz-exercise.service.spec.ts, quiz-submission.service.spec.ts, text-exercise.service.spec.ts, text-submission.service.spec.ts, admin.spec.ts, user-management.spec.ts, assessment-layout.component.spec.ts, code-editor-ace.spec.ts, code-editor-actions.spec.ts, code-editor-build-output.spec.ts
Fix code style issues: remove unnecessary imports
Merge branch 'chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into chore/client-tests-codestyle-docs

- markdown.service.spec.ts
- participation-websocket-service.spec.ts
- programming-exercise-test-case-service.spec.ts
- programming-submission-service.spec.ts
- text-editor-service.spec.ts

Fix code style for participation-websocket-service.spec.ts, programming-exercise-test-case-service.spec.ts, text-editor-service.spec.ts
remove unused imports, try to ignore false postive no-unused-vars

fix config for yarn webpack:build and yarn start commands

remove unused client files
remove event.preventDefault because it should not be needed (we should quickly test though, if DnD questions work on tablets)
Fix code style issue: "Expected an assignment or function call"
Fix code style issues: is defined but never used
Fix code style issues: is assigned a value but never used

Add component/service identifier to filename of all test suites

Assign all files in component directory to correct folder
